modules.description: Adds middleware and a route to enable live reloading in Dream applications, automatically refreshing the browser when source files change. Works with HTTP requests and file system events to trigger updates. Used to streamline development by eliminating manual page reloads during testing.

Provides functions to inject a live reloading script into HTML responses, manage a WebSocket-based reload mechanism, and define a route for handling reload requests. Works with HTML documents, WebSocket connections, and HTTP routes. Used to automatically refresh client browsers when server-side code changes, ensuring immediate feedback during development.
